SELECT bl.intg_bl_seq, bl.ref_no, bl.ref_ofc_cd, (SELECT cnt_cd FROM TB_OFC WHERE OFC_CD = bl.ref_ofc_cd) AS cnt_cd, CASE WHEN bl.biz_clss_cd = 'M' THEN bl.bl_no ELSE mbl.bl_no END AS mbl_no, CASE WHEN bl.biz_clss_cd = 'M' THEN mbl.bl_no ELSE bl.bl_no end AS hbl_no, bl.bkg_no, bl.air_sea_clss_cd, bl.biz_clss_cd, bnd.bnd_clss_cd, 'L' AS hbl_tp_cd, /* 항공은 글로비스 입장에서 COLOAD 임*/ bl.cargo_tp_cd, bl.inco_cd, bl.rep_cmdt_cd, bl.rep_cmdt_nm, bl.fm_svc_term_cd, bl.to_svc_term_cd, CASE WHEN bl.shp_mod_cd = 'FCL' THEN 'F' WHEN bl.shp_mod_cd = 'LCL' THEN 'L' WHEN bl.shp_mod_cd = 'BULK' THEN 'B' WHEN bl.shp_mod_cd = 'FAK' THEN 'F' END AS shp_mod_cd, bl.CNT_CD AS org_cnt_cd, (SELECT CNT_ENG_NM FROM TB_CNT WHERE CNT_CD = bl.CNT_CD) AS org_cnt_nm, bl.inv_no AS inv_no, bl.lc_no, (SELECT TOP 1 IATA_CD FROM TB_TRDP WHERE TRDP_CD = lnr.BL_TRDP_TP_CD) AS CARR_3CD, (SELECT TOP 1 PREFIX FROM TB_TRDP WHERE TRDP_CD = lnr.BL_TRDP_TP_CD) AS CARR_INI, (SELECT TOP 1 LOCL_NM FROM TB_TRDP WHERE TRDP_CD = lnr.BL_TRDP_TP_CD) AS CARR_NM, (SELECT TOP 1 CNT_CD FROM TB_TRDP WHERE TRDP_CD = lnr.BL_TRDP_TP_CD) AS CARR_CNT, bl.flt_no, bl.trnk_vsl_cd, bl.trnk_vsl_nm, bl.trnk_voy, CASE WHEN bl.air_sea_clss_cd = 'S' THEN bl.trnk_vsl_nm ELSE bl.flt_no END vsl_flt, bl.etd_dt_tm, bl.eta_dt_tm, bl.obrd_dt_tm, bl.bl_iss_dt, CASE WHEN bl.frt_term_cd = 'PP' THEN 'P' WHEN bl.frt_term_cd = 'CC' THEN 'C' END AS frt_term_cd, CASE WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'A' THEN bl.pol_cd WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'S' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 STN_NO FROM TB_LOC WHERE LOC_CD = bl.pol_cd) END AS pol_cd, bl.pol_nm, CASE WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'A' THEN bl.pod_cd WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'S' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 STN_NO FROM TB_LOC WHERE LOC_CD = bl.pod_cd) END AS pod_cd, bl.pod_nm, CASE WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'A' THEN bl.por_cd WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'S' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 STN_NO FROM TB_LOC WHERE LOC_CD = bl.por_cd) END AS por_cd, bl.por_nm, CASE WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'A' THEN bl.del_cd WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'S' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 STN_NO FROM TB_LOC WHERE LOC_CD = bl.del_cd) END AS del_cd, bl.del_nm, CASE WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'A' THEN bl.fnl_dest_loc_cd WHEN bl.AIR_SEA_CLSS_CD = 'S' THEN (SELECT TOP 1 STN_NO FROM TB_LOC WHERE LOC_CD = bl.fnl_dest_loc_cd) END AS fnl_dest_loc_cd, bl.FNL_DEST_LOC_NM, bl.grs_wgt, bl.grs_wgt1, bl.CHG_WGT, bl.CHG_WGT1, bl.GRS_WGT_UT_CD, bl.CHG_WGT_UT_CD, bl.meas, bl.meas1, bl.pck_qty, (SELECT cstms_pck_cd_val FROM tb_pck_ut_cd WHERE pck_ut_cd = bl.pck_ut_cd) AS pck_ut_cd, pcd.pck_nm AS pck_ut_nm, (SELECT TOP 1 EDI_CD FROM TB_KR_CSTM_WH_CD WHERE WH_SEQ = bl.cfs_nod_cd) AS cfs_nod_cd, bl.cfs_loc_nm, bl.csts_clr_tp, bl.CURR_CD, bl.RMK, bl.MK_TXT, bl.DESC_TXT, bl.PO_NO, '' AS mrn, CASE WHEN bl.biz_clss_cd = 'M' THEN bl.bl_ser_no ELSE '' END msn, CASE WHEN bl.biz_clss_cd = 'H' THEN bl.bl_ser_no ELSE '' END hsn, isnull(bl.RESERVE_FIELD11, 'N') AS RESERVE_FIELD11, (SELECT TOP 1 shrt_nm FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = shp.trdp_cd) AS shpr_trdp_cd, shp.trdp_nm AS shpr_trdp_nm, shp.trdp_addr AS shpr_trdp_addr, (SELECT TOP 1 shrt_nm FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = cne.trdp_cd) AS cnee_trdp_cd, cne.trdp_nm AS cnee_trdp_nm, cne.trdp_addr AS cnee_trdp_addr, (SELECT TOP 1 shrt_nm FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = ntf.trdp_cd) AS ntfy_trdp_cd, ntf.trdp_nm AS ntfy_trdp_nm, ntf.trdp_addr AS ntfy_trdp_addr, (SELECT TOP 1 shrt_nm FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = act.trdp_cd) AS act_shpr_trdp_cd, act.trdp_nm AS act_shpr_trdp_nm, act.trdp_addr AS act_trdp_addr, (SELECT TOP 1 shrt_nm FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = lnr.trdp_cd) AS lnr_trdp_cd, lnr.trdp_nm AS lnr_trdp_nm, (SELECT TOP 1 scac_cd FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = lnr.trdp_cd) AS lnr_scac_cd, (SELECT TOP 1 shrt_nm FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = ptn.trdp_cd) AS prnr_trdp_cd, ptn.trdp_nm AS prnr_trdp_nm, ptn.trdp_addr AS prnr_trdp_addr, (SELECT TOP 1 shrt_nm FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = agent.trdp_cd) AS agent_trdp_cd, agent.trdp_nm AS agent_trdp_nm, agent.trdp_addr AS agent_trdp_addr, (SELECT TOP 1 shrt_nm FROM TB_TRDP WHERE trdp_cd = ptn2.trdp_cd) AS prnr_trdp_cd2, ptn2.trdp_nm AS prnr_trdp_nm2, ptn2.trdp_addr AS prnr_trdp_addr2, trk.TRDP_CD AS trk_trdp_cd, trk.TRDP_NM AS trk_trdp_nm
FROM tb_intg_bl bl JOIN tb_add_info_bnd bnd ON bl.intg_bl_seq = bnd.intg_bl_seq AND bnd.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr act ON bl.intg_bl_seq = act.intg_bl_seq AND act.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'S02' AND act.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_pck_ut_cd pcd ON bl.pck_ut_cd = pcd.pck_ut_cd AND pcd.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr shp ON bl.intg_bl_seq = shp.intg_bl_seq AND shp.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'S01' AND shp.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr cne ON bl.intg_bl_seq = cne.intg_bl_seq AND cne.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'C01' AND cne.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr ntf ON bl.intg_bl_seq = ntf.intg_bl_seq AND ntf.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'N01' AND ntf.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr lnr ON bl.intg_bl_seq = lnr.intg_bl_seq AND lnr.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'L01' AND lnr.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr ptn ON bl.intg_bl_seq = ptn.intg_bl_seq AND ptn.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'P01' AND ptn.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr agent ON bl.intg_bl_seq = agent.intg_bl_seq AND agent.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'A01' AND agent.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr ptn2 ON bl.intg_bl_seq = ptn2.intg_bl_seq AND ptn2.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'P03' AND ptn2.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bl_prnr trk ON bl.intg_bl_seq = trk.intg_bl_seq AND trk.bl_trdp_tp_cd = 'T02' AND trk.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_intg_bl_rlt rlt ON bl.intg_bl_seq = rlt.intg_bl_seq AND rlt.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_intg_bl mbl ON rlt.rlt_intg_bl_seq = mbl.intg_bl_seq AND mbl.biz_clss_cd = 'M' AND mbl.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE bl.delt_flg = 'N' AND bl.INTG_BL_SEQ = #intg_bl_seq#
SELECT CNTR_NO ,CNTR_TPSZ_CD ,SEAL_NO1 ,SEAL_NO2 ,SEAL_NO3 ,CGO_PCK_QTY ,CGO_PCK_UT ,CGO_WGT ,CGO_MEAS ,CNTR_RMK FROM TB_CNTR_LIST WHERE INTG_BL_SEQ = #intg_bl_seq#
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TB_EDI_SEQ WHERE EDI_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)
sqlMap.update: INSERT INTO TB_EDI_SEQ( EDI_DT ,SEQ )VALUES( CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) ,#value# )
UPDATE TB_INTG_BL SET RESERVE_FIELD11 = 'Y' WHERE INTG_BL_SEQ = #intg_bl_seq#
